PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-13112019-09-04,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS,  FIN
ActAvoiding Complicity in Mistreatment by Foreign Entities Act
SubjectAvoiding Complicity in Mistreatment by Foreign Entities ** Director of Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada **
PrecisOrder authorizing the ISSUANCE of written directions to the Director of Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada respecting the disclosure of, and request for information required by the AVOIDING COMPLICITY IN MISTREATMENT BY FOREIGN ENTITIES ACT, in order to demonstrate a whole-of-government ownership and responsibility for avoiding complicity in mistreatment, and broaden the application of measures to prevent mistreatment to government as a whole.
AttachmentsAttachment
